ExcelFile.title: ExcelFile
ExcelFile.description: Represents an Excel file that has been imported.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ExcelFile entity.

fileName.description: The name of the imported Excel file.

uploadDate.description: The date and time when the Excel file was uploaded.

headers.description: The header row of the excel file

ExcelRow.title: ExcelRow
ExcelRow.description: Represents a single row of data from an imported Excel file.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ExcelRow entity.

columnA.description: Data from column A of the Excel file.

columnB.description: Data from column B of the Excel file.

columnC.description: Data from column C of the Excel file.

columnD.description: Data from column D of the Excel file.

columnE.description: Data from column E of the Excel file.

definition.description: Stores Excel file metadata. Path-based ownership for users. Requires userId and excelFileId parameters.
Stores individual rows from an Excel file. Path-based ownership under a specific user and file. Requires userId, excelFileId, and excelRowId parameters.
